short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enables arrow keys to seek through video by a customizable number of seconds.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take full control of your video-watching experience on Kick with Kick Video Control Enhancer!

This extension allows you to customize video playback on Kick with precision. Set custom seek times for both forward and backward jumps, making it easy to skip or rewind videos by the exact number of seconds you want. Say goodbye to default seek times and enjoy tailored video controls that fit your viewing style.

Key Features:
Customizable Seek Times: Choose how many seconds to skip forward or backward with simple arrow key controls.
Seamless Integration: Works automatically with any video on Kick, no need for manual setup.
Quick Controls: Use your keyboard's arrow keys to jump forward or rewind by your preferred time increments.
User-Friendly Interface: Easily adjust forward and backward times through an intuitive settings menu.
Save Your Settings: Your customized seek times are saved, so you don’t need to reconfigure them every time.
Whether you want to fast-forward through replays or catch missed moments in live streams, Kick Video Control Enhancer gives you the flexibility and control you need for the perfect viewing experience.

Enhance your Kick video experience with Kick Video Control Enhancer, the ultimate tool for personalized playback control! Skip forward or rewind videos by exactly the number of seconds you want using your arrow keys. This simple yet powerful tool ensures you never miss a moment or waste time watching unwanted content. Perfect for streamers, gamers, and video enthusiasts who love complete control over their media playback.

How to Use:
Customize your forward and backward seek times through the extension’s settings.
Use arrow keys to jump forward or backward in the video by your chosen time increment.
Enjoy faster, more precise control over all Kick video content!
No more frustrating default seek times. Take charge of your video-watching experience with Kick Video Control Enhancer today!
